channel.title: Anonymity on the Internet is not going away.

item.title: Anonymous (not verified): Comment 1
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous (not verified)
item.description: The idea of streets without CCTV is not nor will be quaint to most of the world; it's a reality which the Germans of my acquaintance tease me over regularly, since my nation (UK) is widely reported as the most monitored (by CCTV) nation in the world and in their's it remains mostly unused, especially in public areas.
